Appearance: No Reason: Board Related Date of Action: 5/1/2013 Minutes: Emergency Order of Suspension issued. License suspended. Appearance: Yes Reason: Board Related Date of Action: 8/1/2013 Minutes: WHATCOTT, Brett David, D.O. appeared before the Board in response to an Emergency Order of Suspension and Notice of Hearing. Upon a motion by Dr. J. Hearnsberger, seconded by Dr. B. Cogburn, the Board voted unanimously that there has been a violation of the Arkansas Medical Practices Act, that is, ACA 17-95-409 (a)( 2 )(e)(h) and (p). As a result of the violation, Dr. Whatcott s license is revoked for five years, with said revocation being stayed so long as he complies with the following conditions: he must follow the treatment facility guidelines; he will enter into a monitoring contract with the Arkansas Medical Foundation; he will not practice medicine in the state of Arkansas until he returns for an update at the October 2013 meeting; and he will reimburse investigative and hearing expenses in the amount of $763.34 and pay a fine of $1000.00 within one year. The suspension of Dr. Whatcott s license is lifted. There were two votes opposed to this decision. Appearance: Yes Reason: Update Date of Action: 10/4/2013 Minutes: WHATCOTT, Brett David, D.O. appeared for his Arkansas Medical Foundation update. Upon a motion by Dr. S. Simon, seconded by Dr. H. Betton, the Board voted unanimously to accept Dr. Whatcott s appearance for information only and requested he return to the December 2013 meeting for his next update and to bring his evaluation and DEA reports. Appearance: No Reason: Update Date of Action: 12/5/2013 Minutes: Due to inclement weather, Dr. Whatcott's update appearance was rescheduled for the February 2014 meeting. Appearance: Yes Reason: Update Date of Action: 2/6/2014 Minutes: WHATCOTT, Brett David, D.O. appeared for his Arkansas Medical Foundation update. Upon a motion by Dr. J. Citty, seconded by Dr. J. Hearnsberger, the Board voted to waive the felony conviction sentencing order recently handed down and allow him to renew his license.
